text: “læa mu sa di leuxk cak phwkphxng khxng khea sung chay ced sib khn sahrab kahnd wela khxng rea khran meux khwam hiw xan runræng di khra phwk khea khea klaw wa xo phracea hæng kha phraxngkh hak phraxngkh thrng prasngkh læw phraxngkh k thrng thalay phwk khea pi kxn læw læa kha phraxngkh dwy phraxngkh ca thrng thalay phwk kha phraxngkh neuxngdwy sing thi brrda phu chod khela nı hmu phu kha phraxngkh di kratha khun kranan hrux? Man michı xun dı dxk nxkcak kar thdsxb khxng phraxngkh theanan phraxngkh ca thrng hı phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh hlng phid pi neuxngdwy kar thdsxb nan læa ca thrng næana phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh phraxngkh nan khux phuthrng khumkhrxng phwk kha phraxngkh dangnan pord di thrng xphay hı kæ phwk kha phraxngkh læa xendu metta phwk kha phraxngkh dwy theid læa phraxngkh nan khux phuthrng yeiym kwa nı hmu phu hıxphay thanghlay”
